lyrics.text:
Fanongo mai, fanongo mai
He ongoongo mei he langi,
Ko e Tolu Tapu ne alea
Ke ‘ouae tō hotau tautea
Na’e ta’ofia ‘e he Lao,
‘Ikai totonu ke tau hao;
Kae tu’u ‘a e ‘Alo, ‘o pehē,
Ke fua ia ha taha keh
e
.
Fanongo mai, fanongo mai,
He ongoongo mei he langi;
Kuo ‘ofa hifo he ‘Otua,
‘O tamate’i hotau mo’ua.

Fanongo mai, fanongo mai
He ongoongo mei he langi.
He ‘Alo Tapu he ‘Otua
Kuo hifo ki hotau fonua.
Ne ‘ai kakano mo e toto,
‘O nofo ko e fakaongo,
Fai ngāue ē, mo ongosia,
Ke ‘ilo hotau fatongia.
Fanongo mai, fanongo mai,
He ongoongo mei he langi!
Ko e ‘Alo Tapu he ‘Otua
Hoko ko hotau Tokoua.

Fanongo mai, fanongo mai,
He ongoongo mei he langi,
Ko e fili kuo ha’aki fu’u,
Ko Sīsū kuo tau -’o tu’u.
Ne volu hono muiva’e
He milisino mo e Mate,
Ka kuo lava ‘ene tau,
Talu ai ‘ene nofo hau.
Fanongo mai, fanongo mai,
He ongoongo mei he langi;
Kuo Hau ‘i langi hotau Tama,
Kuo ‘osi ‘etau faingata’a.

Fanongo mai, fanongo mai
He ongoongo mei he langi.
Kuo foki mai hotau tofi’a,
Kuo tala hotau tau’atāina.
Neongo pē te tau masiva,
Fai ngāue mo mamahi’ia;
Kae ‘oua na’a tau kei toka’i
Kuo fokotu’u koloa ‘i langi.
Fanongo mai, fanongo mai,
He ongoongo mei he langi,
‘Ilonga ha fie ma’u koloa,
Kuo tō he Hau he me’a kotoa.
